name: Arcana Force XVIII - The Moon
text:
When this card is Summoned, toss a coin:
â—? Heads: During your Standby Phase, you can Special Summon 1 "Moon Token" (Fairy-Type/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0).
